title: English at Work. - Eps. 16-18.
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/English language - Study and teaching - Foreign speakers
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Rehabilitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Industrial hygiene
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Communication in industrial relations
description: In episode 16 information is given on the workers' rehabilitation program, as well as helpful advice on activities people can perform at home to alleviate repetitive strain injury. Episode 17 stresses the importance of effective occupational health and safety procedures in the workplace. And in "Solving problems at work", examples are dramatised on how best to facilitate discussion between employees and employers.
